description.translate: At the very bottom lies the unexpected, curled up in a petrifying breeze and burning with absurd coldness...

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Tréfonds glaciaux\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Tout en bas se cache l'inattendu, lové dans une\"}","{\"text\":\"§7brise pétrifiante et brûlant d'une froideur absurde...\"}","{\"text\":\"§7At the very bottom lies the unexpected, curled up in\"}","{\"text\":\"§7a petrifying breeze and burning with absurd coldness...\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a4 §7DAR§a2 §7RES§c-1\"}"]}}
